title: Moon Circle Gathering: Full Moon in Aries
description: Moon Circle Gathering: Full Moon in Aries Hosted By Ordinary Magic Shop. Event starts on Saturday, 30 September 2023 and happening at Ordinary Magic Shop, Savannah, GA. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
cleaned_text: Time Sat Sep 30 2023 at 06:00 pm to 07:30 pm (GMT-04:00) Google Calendar Outlook Calendar iCal Calendar Yahoo Calendar Ordinary Magic Shop, 1323 Bull St,Savannah,GA,United States Find Tickets About the eventMoon Circle Gathering: Full Moon in Aries Full Moon in Aries Event Saturday, Time: 6:00-7:30pm Cost: $30 in-person | $15 virtual Join Gabby Turner and Ordinary Magic for a full moon healing circle for connecting spiritually, learning, growing, and manifesting as a community in a safe space! This event will offer a brief informational introduction to the Full Moon in Aries' energy, trauma-informed journaling, practical tips for self care, a guided gua sha massage practice to stimulate the (sub)conscious minds, an energizing moving meditation to connect to your inner purpose, and a burning ritual to release anger, frustration, and disappointment holding you back. Come with a journal and pen, a yoga mat or blanket, your favorite crystals, oils, divination tools, or whatever will make you most comfortable. Water, tea, and extra blankets and mats will be provided. This event is open to all humans over the age of 18. All backgrounds, spiritual beliefs, souls, and bodies are welcome! This is a safe space so please bring an open mind and a loving heart.
